name: Letter to Thomas
description:
An old-school style, puzzle platformer accompanied by a heartfelt story. Solve your way through interesting environments as a Postman, determined to keep a special connection alive!



Use "A" and "D" to move.

Press "Space" and "D" to jump and "W" to climb in certain places.

Use trial and error to get over and around obstacles!

Ludum Dare 46 Submission for April 2020.

Sounds from ZapSplat.
